name: Genetic screening for neuronal ECM assembly
citation: Park, Sungjin  (2025) Genetic screening for neuronal ECM assembly (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001447/draft
description: The hippocampal neuronal cultures are treated with HaloTag-Hapln1 (H-Link) pre-conjugated with HaloTag ligand (HTL) on DIV10. The H-Link signal was imaged by Keyence epifluorescence microscopy (CH3: red). For the control, a GFP construct was electroporated on DIV0 and visualized (CH2: green). CH1: MAP2, CH4: Dapi
